mapper.sql: SELECT A.ID AS ID, TITLE, CONTENT, SCHE_TYPE, RDATE, SDATE, EDATE FROM (SELECT * FROM mhj_calendar.schedules) A, ( SELECT * FROM mhj_calendar.sche_details WHERE date_format(SDATE, '%Y-%M-%D') >= date_format(#{fullFirstDate}, '%Y-%M-%D') AND date_format(EDATE, '%Y-%M-%D') <= date_format(#{fullLastDate}, '%Y-%M-%D') ) B WHERE A.ID = B.ID_SCHEDULES
